definition: to burn incense and worship Buddha

sentences.english: The temples were closed, and this sort of thing simply wasn't allowed.
sentences.chinese: 过去庙都给关了，这样烧香拜佛是不允许的。

sentences.english: Three Steps One Bow is one of the Religious activities for "famous Patriarch worships Buddha".
sentences.chinese: 三步一拜是“朝山拜佛”中的一种宗教活动。

sentences.english: So the rich man and his wife went to the temple.
sentences.chinese: 于是那个富人和他的妻子一起去了庙里拜佛。

sentences.english: Half of the visitors were young, according to the temple's management committee.
sentences.chinese: 庙务管理委员会表示，拜佛的人中有一半是年轻人。

sentences.english: My girl told me I was the answer to a maiden's prayer- she did not ask for much.
sentences.chinese: 我的女朋友告诉我说，我就是她求神拜佛得来的对象。

sentences.english: There are endless stream of pilgrims in this temple, who come here to worship the gods and pray.
sentences.chinese: 这座寺庙的香火很旺，前来拜佛许愿的人很多。

sentences.english: To pray for health, every pilgrim would incense and worship here.
sentences.chinese: 想祈求健康去除病魔的信徒们都要到这里烧香拜佛。

sentences.english: It's better to read more books than pray to Buddha for help just before an exam.
sentences.chinese: 考试前夕求神拜佛，还不如平常多看看书呢。

sentences.english: I believe for a business to succeed, it has to pay tribute to Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 我相信一个事业要成功，就必须拜佛进贡。

sentences.english: Streams of visitors from Burma and Thailand come here to worship the Buddha every year.
sentences.chinese: 每年，许多缅甸和泰国的游人到寺庙来拜佛。

sentences.english: And he began to bow to the Buddhas and study the Buddhadharma.
sentences.chinese: 于是乎，他也开始拜佛，研究佛法了。

definition: to burn incense and worship Buddha
to recite or chant Buddhist scripture
to burn incense at a temple
to abstain from eating meat/to be a vegetarian
to worship/to make customary deferences to/a pilgrimage
to pray to Buddha/to chant the names of Buddha
(of a childless couple) to pray for a son/to try to have a child
